trans-unit.source: Provides the context for an <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" /> object.

An <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext> object is typically used to obtain a virtual path or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A> property for use with an expression builder.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext> objeto normalmente é usado para obter um caminho virtual ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A> propriedade para uso com um construtor de expressões.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> class.
The virtual path of the file associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> class using the specified virtual path.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> to use with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> class using the specified template control.
Provides an <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" /> object with a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> object.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> that contains this expression.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> que contém essa expressão.

trans-unit.source: An expression builder might require additional information about the containing page to evaluate or parse the expression value.
trans-unit.target: Um construtor de expressões pode requerer informações adicionais sobre o conteúdo da página para avaliar ou analisar o valor da expressão.

trans-unit.source: This also provides the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> object with information regarding the page that might be required.
trans-unit.target: Isso também fornece o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> objeto com informações sobre a página que pode ser necessária.

trans-unit.source: When an instance of a control is part of a control template, the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.TemplateControl%2A> property contains a reference to the containing control.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de um controle é parte de um modelo de controle, o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.TemplateControl%2A> propriedade contém uma referência para o controle recipiente.

trans-unit.source: Returns a virtual path to the file associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> object.
The virtual path of the file associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" />.
trans-unit.target: O caminho virtual do arquivo associado a <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" />.
